name: life-safety-operation-info
description: Represents BACnet Life Safety Operation Info, which contains information about a life safety operation request, including the requesting process and the operation type.

fields.name: requesting-process-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the process that requested the life safety operation.

fields.name: request
fields.description: The life safety operation that was requested.
